original: naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanevasekkhanāsekkho

analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā asekkham dhammam paṭicca na sekkhaḥ ca na nevasekkha na asekkhaḥ
